overview: Two weeks before Mr. Ravi’s daughter’s wedding, he gets an anonymous call saying his daughter is kidnapped. The kidnapper demands huge amount of money in the span of one hour, but in reality, Mr. Ravi’s daughter is not kidnapped. The kidnapper plays a trick to take money from Mr. Ravi. As the story unfolds the truth, Mr. Ravi starts hating his daughter.
title: Wild World
